description: Death at the Sign of the Rook is an expansive novel that pokes fun of baroque, classic murder mysteries — but also delivers a fully satisfying, all-the-pieces-click-together ending.
title: A light-hearted murder mystery weekend turns deadly in Kate Atkinson's cozy thriller

description: Election officials are raising concerns about the U.S. Postal Service's ability to handle this fall’s expected influx of election mail. But USPS say it’s ready to deliver the country’s ballots.
title: Voters are advised to return their ballots early because of mail delay concerns

description: Under Turkey's proposal, beef would be required to come from cattle that is at least 16 months old, and be marinated with specific amounts of fat, yogurt or milk, onion, salt, thyme, and pepper.
title: Turkey wants to regulate Germany's beloved döner kebab street food

description: Canadian and Italian dignitaries marked the successful recovery of a portrait of Winston Churchill known as "The Roaring Lion," stolen in Canada and recovered in Italy after a two-year search.
title: An iconic Churchill photo stolen in Canada and found in Italy is ready to return
